supplied: ḥ sa rātryā paścime yāme vyutthā
ma. upetya nadyās tapodāyās tīre cīvarakāṇy upanikṣipya nadīṁ tapodām abhyavagāhya gātrāṇi pariṣicya nadīṁ tapodāṁ pratyutthāya, e
tena khalu samayena kokanadaḥ parivrājako yena nadī tapodā tenopajagāma. aśrauṣīd āyuṣmān ānandaḥ
ariṣiñcanaśabdam. śrutvā ca punar āyuṣmatānandenotkāśanaśabdaḥ kṛtaḥ. aśrauṣīt kokanadaḥ parivrājako tasyotkāśa
o ’sy āyuṣman. ahaṁ śramaṇo ’smi. katameṣāṁ śramaṇānām. śākyaputrīyāṇām. pṛccheyam aham āyuṣmāṁ kañcid eva pradeśā
kin nv āyuṣman bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṁ maraṇāt. avyākṛtaṁ bhagava
ṇāt. kin nv āyuṣman na bhavati bhavati ca na bhavati naiva bhavati naiva na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṁ maraṇāt. avyākṛ
a na na bhavati naiva bhavati naiva na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṁ maraṇāt.
kin nv āyuṣman bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṁ maraṇā
na bhavati bhavati ca na na bhavati naiva bhavati naiva na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṁ maraṇād iti pṛṣṭaḥ avyākṛtam iti va
na paśyasi. nāham āyuṣman na jānāmi na paśyāmi. jānāmy ahaṁ paṣyāmi. kin nv āyuṣman jānāsi paśyasi.
nda iti. āścaryaṁ yāvan mahācāryasya śrāvakeṇa sārdham antarākathāsamudāhāraḥ. saced ahaṁ sañjānīyām āyuṣmān ānanda iti
